title: Episode 25 - Best Of 2011 with Jeremy Bolm from Touche Amore
itunes:title: Episode 25 - Best Of 2011 with Jeremy Bolm from Touche Amore
description:
Seeing how much fun we had last year, we decided to bring Jeremy Bolm from Touche Amore back into the studio and go over the "Best Of 2011" in music, movies, TV and podcasts. It's a long one, but filled with awesomeness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
